  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92581</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92581</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Different kinds of salts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Arten der Salze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différents genres de sels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos diferentes dos sais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generi differenti di sali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικά είδη αλάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas clases de sales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three kinds of metal salts and three salt samples of different colours.  This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Arten Metallsalze und 
drei Salzproben der unterschiedlichen Farben. Dieses kann als 
beschriftende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois genres de sels en
métal et de trois échantillons de sel de différentes couleurs. 
Ceci peut être utilisé comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três tipos de sais do 
metal e de três amostras de sal de cores diferentes. Isto pode 
ser usado como um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre generi di sali 
del metallo e di tre campioni del sale dei colori differenti. 
Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρία είδη αλάτων 
μετάλλων και τρία αλατισμένα δείγματα των διαφορετικών χρωμάτων.
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres clases de sales del
metal y de tres muestras de la sal de diversos colores. Esto se 
puede utilizar como ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kupfernes Sulfat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisensulfat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallsalz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natriumchlorid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sulfate de cuivre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sulfate de fer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sel en métal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chlorure de sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sulphate de cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sulphate do ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sal do metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cloreto de sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">solfato di rame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">solfato del ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sale del metallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cloruro di sodio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θειικό άλας χαλκού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θειικό άλας σιδήρου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλας μετάλλων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χλωριούχο νάτριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sulfato de cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sulfato del hierro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sal del metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cloruro de sodio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
